name: Out Royale
description:
Out Royale is an offline single player battle Royale game and more modes coming later.Survive alone in 'Out World' try to be the last one standing to win ,save and load your stats.Search and find weapons items and more like magnetron to fill the power of the radar to let you see how far the zone is from you .Try to find the gold weapons and beat your enemies with these powerful weapons .

Game Features :

-25 Battle Royale survive alone , more modes to come later.

-8 places for 'Out World' .

-6 weapons.

-A Radar system for the zone.

-Shield&health.

-Save&load your stats.

-More with future updates.

Hope you enjoy it !

RKGAMES 953,2020.
